pageContent: Objective: To evaluate health-related quality of life (HRQOL) after salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for locally radiorecurrent prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Preservation of sexual potency in prostatic cancer patients after pelvic lymphadenectomy and retropubic 125I implantation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/439258/
